attribution_model.description: The model used to attribute the goals

attribution_period.description: The period over which the goals are attributed

description.description: A brief description of the goal

enabled.description: Indicates whether the goal is currently enabled

id.description: The unique identifier of the goal

settings.description: Contains the configuration settings for the goals data.

conditions.description: Contains the list of conditions that need to be met for the goals.

items.description: Defines a specific condition for the goals.

operator.description: The comparison operator used in the condition

value.description: The value to be compared in the condition
